description:
Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 tower defense game developed and published by Ninja Kiwi. It is the sixth entry in the Bloons Tower Defense series, and was released for iOS and Android on June 13, 2018, for Microsoft Windows on December 18, 2018, and for macOS on March 20, 2020.

In Bloons TD 6, players must defend their base from waves of incoming Bloons (colored balloons) by placing and upgrading Monkey Towers. Each Monkey Tower has its own unique strengths and weaknesses, and players must carefully plan their defenses in order to succeed.

There are a total of 23 Monkey Towers in Bloons TD 6, each with three different upgrade paths. This gives players a great deal of flexibility in how they customize their defenses.

In addition to Monkey Towers, players can also choose one of 21 Heroes to help defend their base. Heroes are powerful characters that have unique abilities and can be upgraded to make them even stronger.

Bloons TD 6 features a variety of different game modes, including:

  • Campaign: Players must complete a series of levels, each with its own unique challenges.
  • Challenge Editor: Players can create their own custom challenges for other players to try.
  • Odysseys: Players must battle through a series of maps connected by their theme, rules, and rewards.
  • Contested Territory: Players join forces with other players and battle for territory against five other teams.
  • Boss Events: Players must team up with other players to defeat powerful Boss Bloons.
  • Co-Op: Players can team up with other players to complete challenges together.

Bloons TD 6 has been praised for its depth of strategy, its variety of content, and its regular updates. It is one of the most popular tower defense games on the market, and has won numerous awards.
name: Bloons TD 6
